result.markdown: --- title: "Week 11: Dynamic regression" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * How to combine regression models with ARIMA models to form dynamic regression models * Dynamic harmonic regression to handle complex seasonality * Lagged predictors ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 1-7 from [Section 7.10 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/regression-exercises.html). ## Exercise solutions ## Pre-class seminar Read [Chapter 10 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/dynamic.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Assignments * [IA4](../assignments/A4.qmd) is due on Monday 19 May. * [GA4](../assignments/G4.qmd) is due on Monday 26 May.
